Islamabad, the 13th October, 2021
No. F. 2(1)/202f -Pub.-The following Ordinance promulgated on 12th
October, 2021 by the President is hereby published for general information:-
ORDIN-ANCC No. iXlV oF 2021
AN
ORDTNANCE
further to amend the Diplonrutic and Cottsular Oficers (Oath and Fees) Act, 1948
WIIEREAS, it is expedient further to amend the Diplomatic and Consular
Officer (Oath and Fees) Act, 1948 (Act No. XXI of 1948), for the purposes
hereinafter appearing;
AND wttEREAS the Senate and the National Assembly are not in session
and the President of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan is satisfied that
circumstances exist which render it necessary to take immediate actioh;
(723)
Price: Rs. 5.00
11507(2021)lEx. Gaz.l@$eGgqldfto
724 THE GAZETTE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., OCTOBER 14,2021 [PARr I
NOw THEREFORE, in exercise of the powers conferred by clause (l) of
Article 89 ofthe Constitution of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan, the President
of the Islamic Republic of Pakistan is pleased to make and promulgate the
lollowing Ordinance:-
l. Short title and commencert ent.-{I) This Ordinance shall be
called the Diplomatice and Consular Officers (Oath and Fees) (Amendment)
Ordinance, 2021 .
(2) It shall come into force at once.
2. Amendment in section 3, Act XXI of 1948.-ln the Diplomatice
and Consular Officers (Oath and Fees) Ac! 1948(XXI of 1948), hereinafter
referred to as the said Act, in section 3, in sub-section (l), after the word
"administei", the expression "either online or in physical form," shall be inserted.
3. Addition of Section 9, Act XXI of 1948.-In the said Act, after
section 8, the following new section shall be added, namely:-
"9. Power to make rules.-The Federal Government may, by
notification in the official Gazefte, make rules for carrying out the
purposes ofthis Act."
DR. ARIF ALVI,
President.
RAJANAEEM AKBA&
Secretary.
